#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    int half=(n+1)/2,flag=0;
    int a[n],b[n],top[100001]={0},bottom[100001]={0},ans=1000000000;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>a[i]>>b[i];
        top[a[i]]++;
        bottom[b[i]]++;
    }
    for(int i=1;i<=100000;i++)
    {
        if(top[i]+bottom[i]>=half)
        {
            ans=min(ans,max(half-top[i],0));
            flag=1;
        }
    }
    if(flag==1)
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    else
        cout<<"Impossible"<<endl;
    return 0;
}
